context.title: About Java Web
context.description:
1. In the Name field, enter a name for your runtime environment. The default is Java Web.
2. Specify a target definition: • To create build environment from scratch, choose option Use Java Web SDK from the following location. Either choose Browse to select the local SDK directory or manually type the full path to the directory. • To create build environment based on an already created definition, choose option Choose existing target definition. Click on the Manage link to reach the Target Platform preferences in the Preferences page.
3. Choose Finish.
